title: BUG SPLAT AFTER CHARACTER SELECT!
body: So for some reason, today whenever i try and start a game or spectate a game it just bug splats and brings me back to the client. i tried reinstalling and i cant get it figured out. can anyone help me?

replies.body: Maybe try looking up how to disable the Xbox app DVR game recording.

Your may have outdated drivers or bad game files that's causing the game to not render properly.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help troubleshoot this!  Let me know if you have any questions.
